paper_metadata.title: Germline mutations in BRCA1 and BRCA2 in epithelial ovarian cancer patients in Brazil
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Pathogenic mutations in BRCA2, both frameshift, were detected in only two patients, one of them identified for the first time in the present study (c.1963_1963delC, exon 11).

functional_data.summary: The variant is a frameshift mutation leading to a truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified for the first time in this study.
key_quotes: Pathogenic mutations in BRCA2, both frameshift, were detected in only two patients, one of them identified for the first time in the present study (c.1963_1963delC, exon 11).

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Pathogenic mutations in BRCA2, both frameshift, were detected in only two patients, one of them identified for the first time in the present study (c.5576_5579delTTAA).

functional_data.summary: The variant is a frameshift mutation leading to a truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was previously reported in other studies.
key_quotes: Pathogenic mutations in BRCA2, both frameshift, were detected in only two patients, one of them identified for the first time in the present study (c.5576_5579delTTAA).

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
